channel.title: SMF 72 Subtype 4 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 72 Subtype 4 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - altvm
item.description: Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Map: SMF72PRO Based on: fla Description Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field fla.

item.title: Field - arch_mode
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF72PRO Based on: prf Description System in z/ARCH mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - boo
item.description: Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72BOO Description Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Map: SMF72PRO Based on: fla Description Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cne
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF72PRO Based on: prf Description Equipped with ESCON channel Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF72PRO Based on: fla Description Data converted from version 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - cpl
item.description: Length of service class period data sections (subtype4) Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72CPL Description Length of service class period data sections (subtype4)

item.title: Field - cpn
item.description: Number of service class period data sections (subtype4) Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72CPN Description Number of service class period data sections (subtype4)

item.title: Field - cps
item.description: Offset to service class period data sections (subtype4) Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72CPS Description Offset to service class period data sections (subtype4)

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72CYC Description Sampling cycle length

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72DAT Description Date monitor interval start

item.title: Field - dat_facility1
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF72PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dat_facility2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF72PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72DTE

item.title: Field - drc
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF72PRO Based on: prf Description ESCON Director in configuration Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72DTE Description DATE RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - eed
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF72PRO Based on: fla Description Speed boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - eme
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF72PRO Based on: prf Description System in z/ARCH mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF72S4 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - escon_ch
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF72PRO Based on: prf Description Equipped with ESCON channel Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - escon_dir
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF72PRO Based on: prf Description ESCON Director in configuration Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - expanded_stor
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF72PRO Based on: prf Description System has expanded storage Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72FLA Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 invalid_samples 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III interval_smf_control 3 Interval was under SMF control rcl 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72FLG Description SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description new_record 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT subtypes_used 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 prsm_mode 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72GIE Description Projected gathering interval end GMT time

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72IET Description Interval expiration time token

item.title: Field - iip
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF72PRO Based on: fla Description zIIP boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72IML Description Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - interval
item.description: Duration of monitor interval Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72INT Description Duration of monitor interval

item.title: Field - interval_in_milliseconds
item.description: Interval duration in milliseconds Map: SMF72PRO Based on: interval Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return interval.total_seconds() * 1e3

item.title: Field - interval_smf_control
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF72PRO Based on: fla Description Interval was under SMF control Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - invalid_samples
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF72PRO Based on: fla Description Invalid samples to be skipped Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF72PRO Based on: fla Description Interval was under SMF control Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF72PRO Based on: fla Description Invalid samples to be skipped Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: Time monitor interval start Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72IST Description Time monitor interval start

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72LEN Description SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72LGO Description Offset GMT to local time

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF72PRO Based on: fla Description Record was written by RMF Monitor III Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72MFV Description RMF version number

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72MVS Description MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm)

item.title: Field - new_record
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF72S4 Based on: flg Description NEW RECORD FORMAT Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72OIL Description Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds)

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF72S4 Based on: flg Description OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - pe2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF72PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ped
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF72PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72PRD Description Product name

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72PRF Description Processor flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description expanded_stor 0 System has expanded storage escon_ch 1 Equipped with ESCON channel escon_dir 2 ESCON Director in configuration arch_mode 3 System in z/ARCH mode zaap_inst 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed ziip_inst 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed dat_facility1 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 dat_facility2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - pri
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF72PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zAAP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72PRL Description LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72PRN Description NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS

item.title: Field - prp
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF72PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zIIP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72PRS Description OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - prsm_mode
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF72S4 Based on: flg Description SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72PTN Description PR/SM partition number

item.title: Field - qes
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF72PRO Based on: prf Description System has expanded storage Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - r724actf
item.description: Sum of all active frames (long floating point) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724ACTF Description Sum of all active frames (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r724acts
item.description: Sum of all active samples (except OUTR) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724ACTS Description Sum of all active samples (except OUTR)

item.title: Field - r724actv
item.description: Sum of all active users found Map: R724DATA Based on: R724ACTV Description Sum of all active users found

item.title: Field - r724ddev
item.description: Total device delay samples for the group Map: R724DATA Based on: R724DDEV Description Total device delay samples for the group

item.title: Field - r724denq
item.description: Total ENQ delay samples for the group Map: R724DATA Based on: R724DENQ Description Total ENQ delay samples for the group

item.title: Field - r724dhsm
item.description: Total HSM delay samples for the group Map: R724DATA Based on: R724DHSM Description Total HSM delay samples for the group

item.title: Field - r724div
item.description: Sum of all DIV frames (long floating point) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724DIV Description Sum of all DIV frames (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r724divs
item.description: Sum of all DIV samples Map: R724DATA Based on: R724DIVS Description Sum of all DIV samples

item.title: Field - r724djes
item.description: Total JES delay samples for the group Map: R724DATA Based on: R724DJES Description Total JES delay samples for the group

item.title: Field - r724dmnt
item.description: Total mount delay samples for the group Map: R724DATA Based on: R724DMNT Description Total mount delay samples for the group

item.title: Field - r724dmsg
item.description: Total message delay samples for the group Map: R724DATA Based on: R724DMSG Description Total message delay samples for the group

item.title: Field - r724dpro
item.description: Total processor delay samples for the group Map: R724DATA Based on: R724DPRO Description Total processor delay samples for the group

item.title: Field - r724dsto
item.description: Total storage delay samples for the group Map: R724DATA Based on: R724DSTO Description Total storage delay samples for the group

item.title: Field - r724dxcf
item.description: Total XCF delay samples for the group Map: R724DATA Based on: R724DXCF Description Total XCF delay samples for the group

item.title: Field - r724end
item.description: The number of transactions that ended in the group (Format: long floating point Unit: microseconds) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724END Description The number of transactions that ended in the group (Format: long floating point Unit: microseconds)

item.title: Field - r724esct
item.description: Count of “long” swaps to expanded storage for the group Map: R724DATA Based on: R724ESCT Description Count of “long” swaps to expanded storage for the group

item.title: Field - r724et
item.description: Total execution time for all transactions that ended in the group. Does not include queued time. (Format: long floating point Unit: 1024-microseconds) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724ET Description Total execution time for all transactions that ended in the group. Does not include queued time. (Format: long floating point Unit: 1024-microseconds)

item.title: Field - r724etx
item.description: Total execution time for all transactions that ended in the group. Same as R724ET, but in microseconds. Map: R724DATA Based on: R724ETX Description Total execution time for all transactions that ended in the group. Same as R724ET, but in microseconds.

item.title: Field - r724fix
item.description: Sum of all fixed frames (long floating point) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724FIX Description Sum of all fixed frames (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r724gpi
item.description: Sum of shared page-ins from auxiliary storage (long floating point) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724GPI Description Sum of shared page-ins from auxiliary storage (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r724idle
item.description: Sum of all idle frames (long floating point) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724IDLE Description Sum of all idle frames (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r724idls
item.description: Sum of all idle samples Map: R724DATA Based on: R724IDLS Description Sum of all idle samples

item.title: Field - r724lcnm
item.description: Service class name Map: R724DATA Based on: R724LCNM Description Service class name

item.title: Field - r724lscf
item.description: Sum of all central frames for all logically swapped users at all samples (long floating point) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724LSCF Description Sum of all central frames for all logically swapped users at all samples (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r724lsct
item.description: Count of “long” logical swaps for the group Map: R724DATA Based on: R724LSCT Description Count of “long” logical swaps for the group

item.title: Field - r724lsef
item.description: Sum of all expanded frames for all logically swapped users at all samples (long floating point) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724LSEF Description Sum of all expanded frames for all logically swapped users at all samples (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r724lssa
item.description: Total logically swapped samples for the group Map: R724DATA Based on: R724LSSA Description Total logically swapped samples for the group

item.title: Field - r724or1
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 1: Terminal output wait Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR1 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 1: Terminal output wait

item.title: Field - r724or10
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 10: Unilateral swap Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR10 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 10: Unilateral swap

item.title: Field - r724or11
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 11: Transition swap Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR11 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 11: Transition swap

item.title: Field - r724or12
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 12: Improve central storage usage Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR12 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 12: Improve central storage usage

item.title: Field - r724or13
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 13: Improve system paging rate Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR13 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 13: Improve system paging rate

item.title: Field - r724or14
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 14: Make room for an out too long user Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR14 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 14: Make room for an out too long user

item.title: Field - r724or15
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 15: APPC wait Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR15 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 15: APPC wait

item.title: Field - r724or16
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 16: OMVS input wait Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR16 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 16: OMVS input wait

item.title: Field - r724or17
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 17: OMVS output wait Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR17 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 17: OMVS output wait

item.title: Field - r724or18
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 18: In-real swap Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR18 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 18: In-real swap

item.title: Field - r724or2
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 2: Terminal input wait Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR2 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 2: Terminal input wait

item.title: Field - r724or3
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 3: Long wait Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR3 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 3: Long wait

item.title: Field - r724or4
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 4: Auxiliary storage shortage Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR4 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 4: Auxiliary storage shortage

item.title: Field - r724or5
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 5: Real storage shortage Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR5 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 5: Real storage shortage

item.title: Field - r724or6
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 6: Detected long wait Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR6 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 6: Detected long wait

item.title: Field - r724or7a
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 7: Memory pool shortage Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR7A Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 7: Memory pool shortage

item.title: Field - r724or8
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 8: Enqueue exchange swap Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR8 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 8: Enqueue exchange swap

item.title: Field - r724or9
item.description: STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 9: Exchange swap Map: R724SWRE Based on: R724OR9 Description STOR/OUTR delay samples for swap reason 9: Exchange swap

item.title: Field - r724outr
item.description: Sum of all out and ready users at all samples Map: R724DATA Based on: R724OUTR Description Sum of all out and ready users at all samples

item.title: Field - r724page
item.description: Sum of all users delayed for paging at all samples Map: R724DATA Based on: R724PAGE Description Sum of all users delayed for paging at all samples

item.title: Field - r724percount
item.description: Service class period number Map: R724DATA Based on: R724PER# Description Service class period number

item.title: Field - r724pgin
item.description: Sum of all page-ins Map: R724DATA Based on: R724PGIN Description Sum of all page-ins

item.title: Field - r724pnam
item.description: Name of active service policy Map: R724DATA Based on: R724PNAM Description Name of active service policy

item.title: Field - r724psct
item.description: Count of “long” physical swaps for the group Map: R724DATA Based on: R724PSCT Description Count of “long” physical swaps for the group

item.title: Field - r724psef
item.description: Sum of all expanded frames for all swapped users (except logical) at all samples (long floating point) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724PSEF Description Sum of all expanded frames for all swapped users (except logical) at all samples (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r724pssa
item.description: Total swapped samples for the group (except logical) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724PSSA Description Total swapped samples for the group (except logical)

item.title: Field - r724ptm
item.description: Time policy was activated (Format: STORE CLOCK Unit: local time) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724PTM Description Time policy was activated (Format: STORE CLOCK Unit: local time)

item.title: Field - r724qt
item.description: Total time spent on JES or APPC queues by all transactions that ended in the group (Format: long floating point Unit: 1024-microseconds) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724QT Description Total time spent on JES or APPC queues by all transactions that ended in the group (Format: long floating point Unit: 1024-microseconds)

item.title: Field - r724qtx
item.description: Total time spent on JES or APPC queues by all transactions that ended in the group. Same as R724QT, but in microseconds. Map: R724DATA Based on: R724QTX Description Total time spent on JES or APPC queues by all transactions that ended in the group. Same as R724QT, but in microseconds.

item.title: Field - r724slot
item.description: Sum of all slots used (long floating point) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724SLOT Description Sum of all slots used (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r724swap
item.description: Sum of all users delayed for swapping at all samples Map: R724DATA Based on: R724SWAP Description Sum of all users delayed for swapping at all samples

item.title: Field - r724tsv
item.description: Sum of shared page views (long floating point) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724TSV Description Sum of shared page views (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r724udev
item.description: Total device using samples for the group Map: R724DATA Based on: R724UDEV Description Total device using samples for the group

item.title: Field - r724unkn
item.description: Total unknown state samples for the group Map: R724DATA Based on: R724UNKN Description Total unknown state samples for the group

item.title: Field - r724upro
item.description: Total processor using samples for the group Map: R724DATA Based on: R724UPRO Description Total processor using samples for the group

item.title: Field - r724user
item.description: Sum of all users found Map: R724DATA Based on: R724USER Description Sum of all users found

item.title: Field - r724vald
item.description: Total valid samples for the group (single state sum of all using, delay, idle, and unknown) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724VALD Description Total valid samples for the group (single state sum of all using, delay, idle, and unknown)

item.title: Field - r724vect
item.description: Total vector utilization time for the group (Format: long floating point Unit: microseconds) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724VECT Description Total vector utilization time for the group (Format: long floating point Unit: microseconds)

item.title: Field - r724vin
item.description: Sum of shared pages in central storage, that are valid (long floating point) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724VIN Description Sum of shared pages in central storage, that are valid (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r724vlc
item.description: Sum of shared page validations (long floating point) Map: R724DATA Based on: R724VLC Description Sum of shared page validations (long floating point)

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72RAL Description Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records. Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72RAN Description Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72RAO Description Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF72PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF72PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72RTY Description RECORD TYPE

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72SAM Description Number of samples

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72SEG Description SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72SID Description SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72SNM Description System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME

item.title: Field - spl
item.description: Length of swap reason data sections (subtype 4) Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72SPL Description Length of swap reason data sections (subtype 4)

item.title: Field - spn
item.description: Number of swap reason data sections (subtype 4) Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72SPN Description Number of swap reason data sections (subtype 4)

item.title: Field - sps
item.description: Offset to swap reason data sections (subtype 4) Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72SPS Description Offset to swap reason data sections (subtype 4)

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72SRL Description SMF record level

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72SSI Description SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF )

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72STY Description SUBTYPE

item.title: Field - subtypes_used
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF72S4 Based on: flg Description SUBTYPES USED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72SYN Description SYNC value in seconds

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF72S4 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TIME RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72TME Description TIME RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF72S4 Based on: SMF72TRN Description NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF72S4 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF72S4 Based on: flg Description MVS/XA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF72PRO Based on: SMF72XNM Description Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX

item.title: Field - zaap_inst
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF72PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zAAP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ziip_inst
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF72PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zIIP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.
